resources.string: Currently,we can only consturct connections between devices which are under the same local network(including android phone Access Point(AP)),and in the case of being a canvas host while hosting AP, the devices\'s magic number is always 043001 instead of shown 000000.

About West Coast Motor:
At the time of the first version of this app released,we were graduate school students of National Taiwan University.Because one of us is come from WC lab and the others are CM lab members, we combined the name of two labs results WCM,West Coast Motor!!
Please key in "Magic Number" to connect to the host
Tell you friends this number to connect in!!
